flawed_nl_solution:
He is 8 inches too short this year because 54 - 48 = <<54-48=8>>8
He will naturally grow 4 inches taller because 12 x (1/3) = <<12*(1/3)=4>>4
He needs to grow 4 inches from hanging because 8 - 4 = <<8-4=4>>4
He needs to hang for 48 hours because 4 / (1/12) = <<4/(1/12)=48>>48
He needs to hang for 4 hours a month because 48 / 12 = <<48/12=4>>4
#### 4

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 6, not 8. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
